title: hostel doubt
content: Is the temporary hostel allocation based on a first-come, first-served basis?

comments.body: also do they give rooms with separate bathrooms in the temporary allocation
I'm not sure about it ðŸ¤” depends on your luck I guess
If your one of the first 50-60 ppl who come for hostel allotment u have a good chance of getting the rooms with attached bathroom
Come early for the temporary room allotment, the quicker you're registered the better chance you have for rooms and even helps during permanent room allotment
